thread.title: An Antarctic adventure to value forever
thread.title_full: An Antarctic adventure to value forever

title: An Antarctic adventure to value forever
text:
Topix › Pacific Travel › An Antarctic adventure to value forever An Antarctic adventure to value forever Next Story Prev Story 2 hrs ago Read more: NEWS.com.au 
SINCE the days of Douglas Mawson's pioneering expeditions in the early 1900s, Australian scientists have been at the forefront of Antarctic research. With climate change, the state of the world's oceans and whaling an increasing focus of concern, the need for a solid scientific understanding of the polar regions has never been more important. Start the conversation, or Read more at NEWS.com.au.
